plugin.name: autodetect
plugin.description: Plugin contains auto-detection plugins for video/audio in- and outputs

element.name: autoaudiosink
element.description: Wrapper audio sink for automatically detected audio sink
element.author: Jan Schmidt <thaytan@noraisin.net>

element.name: autoaudiosrc
element.description: Wrapper audio source for automatically detected audio source
element.author: Jan Schmidt <thaytan@noraisin.net>, Stefan Kost <ensonic@users.sf.net>

element.name: autovideosink
element.description: Wrapper video sink for automatically detected video sink
element.author: Jan Schmidt <thaytan@noraisin.net>

element.name: autovideosrc
element.description: Wrapper video source for automatically detected video source
element.author: Jan Schmidt <thaytan@noraisin.net>, Stefan Kost <ensonic@users.sf.net>
